ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: If they are interested in learning about approaches to the psychology of organizational actors, or the micro-interactions in organizations, then this is a perfect class.
Will learn a lot, but a lot of work and class discussions can seem very unstructured making it hard to glean the important insights from each session.
I would highly recommend the course to a fellow student.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Made me aware of lines of thought/research I never knew existed.
As someone who is interested in occupations, organizations, and work, this class has provided a wonderful overview of relevant materials in the two fields of research.
A necessary class for OB students.
